Author: HumanAI
Title: [ANN][PRE-TGE] HumanAI- Protect Control and Monetize Personal Data for AI
Body: Human-AI (HAI) is a decentralized data exchange system that protects and monetizes personal data to enable global user-centric artificial intelligence. The project comes from a series of research projects at top universities including MIT and ETH Zurich.  Human-AI aims to solve three problems: Users have limited control of personal data Data is valuable but users generating it receive no financial reward New regulations force companies to find alternative solutions to dealing with personal data     with a blockchain-based solution ensuring that: Personal data is encrypted and controlled by users on-device Encrypted AI runs on encrypted data to provide same functionalities Data is monetized and value it creates goes back to users  Human-AI will develop three products to achieve its vision: A mobile app to unlock personal data on mobile devices (e.g. app utility, sensor & OS log, location & movement) A SDK to unlock data in third-party apps to support companies in sharing data revenues, complying with new regulations, and inter-connecting other data sources Extend the solution towards AR/MR to unlock new data types (e.g., attention and focus in the physical world) for better user interaction and personalization  The core team of Human-AI: Are/were researchers at ETH Zurich and MIT, focusing on machine learning and blockchain Work closely in various research projects and start-up initiatives and come up with good team spirit, trust, and results Human-AI is a solution originally comes from academic research to close the gap between personalization and privacy protection  Token Generation Event: Token Symbol: HAI (ERC20 Token) Hard Cap: $20 Million Total HAI Created: 1,000,000,000 Max. Units of HAI Sold: 400,000,000 Pre-Sale Launch Time: 2018 Q2 Public-Sale Launch Time: 2018 Q3  Website: https://humanai.co/ White Paper: https://humanai.co/wp-content/uploads/whitepaper/humanai-white-paper-v1.0.pdf One-Pager: https://humanai.co/wp-content/uploads/whitepaper/humanai-one-pager-v1.0.pdf  Details about token generation and pre-sale will be announced soon. Stay updated: Twitter: https://twitter.com/HumanAIOfficial Medium: https://medium.com/@HumanAI Telegram: https://t.me/HumanAIOfficial Email: contact@humanai.co
